Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the cardiovascular system 50% Cognitive impairment 50% Abnormal bleeding - Clinodactyly - Intellectual disability - Prolonged bleeding time - Ptosis - Pyloric stenosis - Radial deviation of finger - Sporadic - Thrombocytopenia - Trigonocephaly - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
